# Image Narration

> Image Narration is a tool that allows you to generate text descriptions of images.

## Core Features
- [Free Image Narration](https://imagenarration.com): Upload images, generate text descriptions.
- [Pricing](https://imagenarration.com#pricing): List free and paid plans.
- [Easy to Use](https://imagenarration.com#usage): Click to edit text, hover to upload images, real-time preview
- [FAQ](https://imagenarration.com#faq): Frequently asked questions and troubleshooting

## Resources
- [Blog](https://imagenarration.com/en/blog): Information about image narration.
- [Legal](https://imagenarration.com/en/legal):  Privacy policy and terms of service.
